titles.title: Authorizing the Director of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion and the Director of the Office of the Whistleblower Ombudsman to each appoint and fix the pay of employees of their respective Offices.

Authorizing the Director of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion and the Director of the Office of the Whistleblower Ombudsman to each appoint and fix the pay of employees of their respective Offices.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 695, H. Res. 693 is considered passed House.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes the Director of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion of the House of Representatives and the Director of the Office of the Whistleblower Ombudsman of the House to each appoint and fix the pay of employees of their respective offices.
